channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14374] Backport parent 'HBASE-14317 Stuck FSHLog' issue to 1.1
item.description: Backport parent issue to branch-1.1. and branch-1.0.
item.summary: Backport parent 'HBASE-14317 Stuck FSHLog' issue to 1.1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Only difference is making patch work with old MVCC name ('consistency' vs 'concurrency')
